issue.title: gazebo 7.8 crash more visible or more common

content.raw:
@T_AL if it is stuck with harness in state 4 (as in #210 or [this problem with pelvis height](#!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/99/reset-joint-positions-after-harnessing-all/diff#comment-38580537)), I have had some success by sending new pelvis height commands, or just manually detaching (at your own risk) if both feet are on the ground but the weight distribution is uneven, causing the detachment logic not to trigger:

~~~
rostopic pub -1 /valkyrie/harness/detach std_msgs/Bool true
~~~
